column2: Iraqi Kurds seek funds from oil companies for Syria refugees ARBIL
column4: Sept 15 Iraqi Kurdistan has asked oil companies operating in the autonomous region for $50 million to help deal with an influx of refugees from Syria that has put a strain on its resources.

column2: Sailing-Drama builds as Oracle mounts comeback in America's CupUPDATE 2-Sailing-New Zealand and U.S. boats split thrilling America's Cup races SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Sept. 15 Oracle Team USA and Emirates Team New Zealand split two dramatic races on Sunday
column4: winning one each in heavy winds on San Francisco Bay and sending the America's Cup sailing regatta into a tense and unexpectedly close final week of competition.  UPDATE 2-Sailing-New Zealand and U.S. boats split thrilling America's Cup races SAN FRANCISCO
